bibl.title: Select Papyri. I. Non-Literary Papyri. Private Affairs. With an English Translation.
bibl.seg: Hunt Arthur S. and C.C. Edgar, Select Papyri. I. Non-Literary Papyri. Private Affairs. With an English Translation. (The Loeb Classical Library. 266.)
London, W. Heinemann - Cambridge, MA, Harvard University Press, 1932, 8°, xx-452 pp.

C.R. par W.M. Calder, CR 47 (1933) p. 242. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 14 (1934) pp. 109-110. - Paul Collart, RPhil 3e s., 8 (1934) pp. 389-390. - Casper J. Kraemer, Jr., CJ 31 (1936) pp. 450-451. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 10 (1935) No. 20, pp. 402-403. - Karl Fr.W. Schmidt, PhilWoch 53 (1933) coll. 1317-1318. - P. Shorey, CP 28 (1933) p. 236.
